channel.title: Las Animas County|Colorado|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Las Animas County|Colorado|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-25 South - Raton Pass
item.description: I-25 south at Raton Pass - Elevation 7,834 Feet. Milemarker 0 is in the background which is the New Mexico - Colorado State Line. The New Mexico Port of Entry is immediately past the state line.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 460 (New Mexico)
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 460 (New Mexico) - Raton Pass/Weigh Station. The Colorado-New Mexico state line is on the top of Raton Pass.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 460
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 460 (New Mexico) - Raton Pass/Weigh Station.

item.title: I-25 South - Bear Crossing
item.description: Bear crossing on I-25 south on Raton Pass in Las Animas County.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 2
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 2 - Wootton. This is the last exit on I-25 south in Colorado.

item.title: I-25 South - Raton Pass 3 Miles
item.description: Distance to top of Raton Pass on I-25 south. Raton Pass - 3 Miles.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 2
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 2 - Wootton. This is the last exit on I-25 south in Colorado.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 6
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 6 - Gallinas.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 8
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 8 - Spring Creek.

item.title: I-25 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-25 south to Raton and Las Vegas. Both destination cities are in New Mexico.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 11
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 11 - Starkville/Weigh Station/Chain Up Area. After the Starkville interchange, the highway begins climbing towards Raton Pass.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 13B
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 13B - CO-12 West/Main St.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 14
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 14 - Commercial St./Downtown.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 14
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 14. Use Exit 14 for BL-25/Trinidad.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 14
item.description: I-25 South approaching Exit 14 - Commercial St./Downtown.

item.title: I-25 South - Trinidad Exits
item.description: Trinidad Exits on I-25 south. Trinidad Exits: US-160 East/CO-239 North, Commercial St., CO-12 West/Main St.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 15
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 15 - US-160 East/CO-239 North/Kit Carson Trail/Goddard Ave. US-160 east leaves I-25 southbound at this interchange.

item.title: I-25 South - Trinidad City Limit
item.description: Entering Trinidad on I-25 south. Trinidad is the county seat of Las Animas County.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 18
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 18 - El Moro Road/Rest Area.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 23
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 23 - Hoehne Road.

item.title: I-25 South - Ludlow Massacre Memorial
item.description: I-25 South approaching Exit 27. Use Exit 27 for the Ludlow Massacre Memorial. The Ludlow Massacre occured in 1914 when the Colorado National Guard opened fire on striking miners killing 39 people.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 27
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 27 - Ludlow.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 30
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 30 - Aguilar Road.

item.title: I-25 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-25 south. Distance to Trinidad and Raton (New Mexico).

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 34
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 34 - Aguilar. This interchange also connects with BL-25 into Aguilar, but it is not signed at the junction.
